name: Scarga
description:
DISCLAIMER! this is a demo version we currently working on the game, please report every bug and send us more feedback as possible, we're just a bunch of indies trying to give life a project, support us ♥

The Game:

The planet Turtan is in danger and the habitants ask for help to solve the problem. The bad guys are taking life from the planet and Scarga must stop them before it's too late, join the heroin Scarga in this retro challenging adventure through the lands of Turtan and free the planet from the claws of the EVIL!

Controls:

Z Shoot
X Jump
C Dash
Arrow Keys Move
